name: lithic-knot-example
description: This repository shows how to create and tokenize credit cards with the [Lithic Create Card API](https://docs.lithic.com/docs/cards#create-card) and forward this card to another API, for example [Knot Card Swap](https://docs.knotapi.com/docs/user-update), using [Basis Theory Proxy](https://docs.basistheory.com/#proxy).
